website_summaries.verdict: These bands provide gentle, moderate support for arch pain, and are low-profile enough to wear with many styles of shoes.
pros: Low-profile design allows you to wear with many types of shoes
cons: If you wear with stocking material, be careful that the hook-and-loop closure does not snag your stockings

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband he has that condition where yuh feel like you stepped on a rock all the time. These are supposed to help but he doesn’t remember to use them much and starting using duct tape instead because it was handy everywhere. I’m sure these would work if you use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as described and they WILL NOT ACCEPT RETURNS despite their worthless satisfaction guarantee. They are not "a soft stretchy breathable fabric." They are in fact a hard piece of plastic with a strap that is not strong enough to keep something so rigid in place. I would never have bought this with an accurate description. I hate companies that trick you like this. Edit: I was wrong. You can take out the insert. I added 2 stars but I am still unhappy that they are not clear on the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable and give real support, stopping arch/heel pain during walking or exercising.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first pair in the 90's and am still using them. I thought it was time to get a second pair for an upcoming trip. Over the years I've tried many different types of arch supports only to be disappointed. You can throw them in the washing machine and they fit in causal or dress shoes. They are the only thing that made it possible to walk for months while experiencing a sever case of Plantar Fascitis.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are saving my feet! I love wearing sandals or going barefoot and these let me do so without worrying about wearing inserts. If I had to chose 5 things to take with me on a deserted island, these would be on the list. Great for plantar fasciitis A good price Wish they came in a tan/beige color
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mulvany

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worked for my foot injury
customer_reviews.text: I used this every day for that arch support for 4 months Dont know what I would have done without it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good... not great
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but slides around my foot as I walk. If I get them any tighter, I won’t be able to feel my feet.
customer_reviews.author: wkg96

customer_reviews.title: ... when I walk barefoot in the house as I hate wearing shoes in the house
customer_reviews.text: Use these all the time for when I walk barefoot in the house as I hate wearing shoes in the house. I have horrible arch pain when I walk barefoot but these fit the problem. Because it is so bulky I could never wear them with my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mjb Ne

customer_reviews.title: May not be the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad case of Plantar fasciitis and thought these might help. Hard to wear in shoes unless very loose. I wouldn't say, not to get them but I went to Dr. Scholls and hot a gel insole that fits in the heel and not the entire shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Feet dont hurt anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have very high arches and lately my feet have been sore by the end of the day. Tried these out hoping they would work. Gotta say they are excellent. Fit my high arch great. Feet dont hurt anymore. The plastic inserts have held up with no wear at all. 15 bucks for them is great
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miedel

customer_reviews.title: Great barefoot arch support for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear these around the house when I’m barefoot. They give me arch support and keep me from straining my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: SuziQT

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: It's a much better price than CVS. They're comfortable with most of my shoes and provide good support all day. So far so good after a few months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps my feet
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a product that I can wear without shoes. Need orthodics all the time as I have bad arthritis on the top of my feet. These support me if I want to wear swim shoes, slippers oe barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Wisner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and helps provide relief for the heels!
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: the product isn't as good as other braces I've tried and doesn't provide general ...
customer_reviews.text: not quite what I was expecting. Although this may provide some additional arch support, the product isn't as good as other braces I've tried and doesn't provide general foot support.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: Very good support for the arch that helps to relieve my Plantar Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my husband and he loves them. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them. He says "they have made a big difference, he is pain free now". This was my second order for them, He wears them all the time. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wore these for 4 hours like the instructions dictate and my feet have never hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for 4 hours like the instructions dictate and my feet have never hurt worse. Cannot be returned. Annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: MsC

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for something to give you great arch support, I recommend this. Love the velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me. The right amount of arch support and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Yay! Works just like the one I paid a lot more for.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Lester

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing saves my life every day. Cant go without them.
customer_reviews.author: M-M

customer_reviews.title: HELPED.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical anything could help with my foot pain. This has, and now I feel I am on the path to resolving my plantar fasciitus.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stockbridge

customer_reviews.title: Best Help for Plantar's Fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: The best help for plantar's fasciitis! This was an instant cure for me in that it give me relief immediately. I also found I had to stop eating all gluten to finalize my cure, but at least I had relief. I'll continue to wear these forever. This truly is the best arch support I've ever found!
customer_reviews.author: TMK

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay put.
customer_reviews.text: Good in theory only. They don't stay put and tend to slide forward toward the toes and they also prevented most of my shoes from being wearable as the added bulk made my shoes too tight to go on.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: WOW - if you need these, they are a foot-saver!
customer_reviews.text: WOW - if you need these, they are a foot-saver! My arches REALLY hurt if I walk much, down near the big toe. I would almost cry most nights! These put GENTLE support, especially further up on the arch (surprisingly since that part does not hurt) and totally stop the pain!! I always wear Podiatrist-made arch supports, but they were not stopping the pain -- these do! I wear them loosely and wear them to bed - NO problem (I tend to bend my toes downward in bed, exacerbating my arch pain). A friend told me I needed them and WOW I really owe her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that helps my husbands terrible plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that helps my husbands terrible plantar fasciitis. They offer a great deal of support for arches and are pretty comfortable even with constant wear.
customer_reviews.author: woaafm

customer_reviews.title: Helps flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I can wear them with most of my shoes. Cheaper tgg hv am buying inserts for my shoes They work well with good support and comfort
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: Relief of pain from plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a family member and the relief she felt was immediate. She wears it daily and her pain is gone. I recommended this to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: selin O

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I can adjust them to fit my fat old feet and no more pain. These are amazing! No more foot cramps and other aches and pains associated with my problems! Ahhhh. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Annie

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable in any shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable in any shoe ,sandals or sneakers. I even use they at night when I don't want to sleep in the boot for my heal spur
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar flashitas these help a lot , good support
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Defective Caution
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work as stated.... injured my foot to where I am unable to walk without extreme pain. And they do not offer refunds!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Comes with two interchangeable arch supports. Very comfortable for all day use!
customer_reviews.author: gms

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these helped me get over plantar fasciitis. I had it for 3 months before I got these, and within a month my plantar fasciitis was healed
customer_reviews.author: Hailie N.

customer_reviews.title: I received more than expected. Will be ordering another ...
customer_reviews.text: I received more than expected. Will be ordering another just to have on hand and before it is discontinued. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: These supports are wonderful. Because they strap on, I can wear them when barefoot as well as inside my shoe. They will fit in most laced up shoes. I've been able to make do with just the single insert, but a second insert is available as a replacement or for additional support. My husband was having plantar facitis issues because he couldn't put the expensive supports in all of his shoes. I made him try these, and he now wear the also.
customer_reviews.author: pitcheng

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Pieces Go Inside the Sleeves!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while before I figured out that the plastic pieces go *inside* a sleeve on the underside of the arch support. Works a lot better that way. :-) Otherwise, they work well to relieve my foot arch cramps.
customer_reviews.author: John Hanley

customer_reviews.title: I am a PE teacher and this is the best product I have found for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I am a PE teacher and this is the best product I have found for my feet. Without these, i would not be able to participate all day with my students.
customer_reviews.author: BK

product_meta.title: FUTURO Therapeutic Arch Support, Ideal Athletic, Everyday Activities, and Plantar Fasciitis Pain, Breathable, One Size
product_meta.description: Arch pain associated with planter fasciitis can keep you from logging your miles, and even enjoying everyday activities. The FUTURO Therapeutic Arch Support provides customizable support with removable inserts, and offers comfortable compression with stretchy, breathable materials. Designed to be worn with or without shoes for versatile comfort. You're not one to let arch pain sideline you–so take the proactive approach with FUTURO Therapeutic Arch Support.
feature_bullets: Helps relieve heel, foot and arch pain with moderate support and customizable inserts, cushioning and compression
Low-profile design is compatible with footwear
Soft, stretchy fabric offers a custom fit
Breathable materials help keep your skin dry
Intended to help support the foot, arch and heel, including the symptoms of plantar fasciitis
